fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use an ability from one of your known roles, once you use it, you can't use that role again.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You start knowing 3 random <:underdogFaction:1304295093989281853> **Underdog** roles, 1 each from the Killing, Protective and Investigative subalignments.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all evil threats to the Underdogs.
